name: 7 sevens: Free
description:
Can you count to 7? Then you can play 7 sevens! A simple, yet addicting number matching puzzle game. Drop numbers, break blocks, get huge high scores, and challenge your friends!

7 sevens Free gives you unlimited access to “Time Attack”. With 7 minutes on the clock, you’ll need to think fast to score big. Eliminate gray watch tiles to add precious seconds to the clock. How far can you go before time runs out?

Get the full version for 3 more exciting game modes: the original “Classic”, the unforgiving “Hardcore”, and the recurring dream of “Groundhog Day”.

User reviews for 7 sevens:

***** “This game is completely addicting! So simple yet so fun!” - Litasail

How to Play:
*Match up the correct number of tiles with the corresponding number on the tile. 2 twos disappear when placed next to one another. 3 threes - boom! 4 fours, 5 fives, 6 sixes, and -- you guessed it -- 7 sevens.
*Each round you complete scores you bonus points, but also drops 7 new tiles on your board.
*Gray blocks get in your way. Make matches to clear them away or use the powerful 1 tile to eliminate them right away. The more you clear, the more time you’ll get and the bigger your score booster will become!
*Save a tile for later and swap it in when you need it.
*When the clock runs out or your board is full it’s game over. Share your score, challenge your friends, then start again to beat your own high score.

The great gameplay is complemented by beautiful graphics and a melodic soundtrack. You’ll find yourself losing hours to the complex simplicity of 7 sevens.

Download it now!
